code: import React from'react';import{XYPlot,XAxis,YAxis,VerticalGridLines,HorizontalGridLines,LineSeries}from'react-vis';var Chart=function Chart(props){var dataArr=props.data.map(function(d){return{x:d.crimedate+'/'+d.crimetime,y:parseFloat(d.description/1000)};});return React.createElement(XYPlot,{xType:"ordinal",width:1000,height:500},React.createElement(VerticalGridLines,null),React.createElement(HorizontalGridLines,null),React.createElement(XAxis,{title:"Period of time(Date and time)"}),React.createElement(YAxis,{title:"Types of Crimes"}),React.createElement(LineSeries,{data:dataArr,style:{stroke:'violet',strokeWidth:3}}));};export default Chart;
